history.proof: intros x y eps H. apply NormedModule.ax3 with (K:=K) (V:=V) (m:=NormedModule.class K V). auto.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
K: AbsRing
V: NormedModule K

Goal:
forall (x y : V) (eps : R), norm (minus y x) < eps -> ball x eps y

Premises:
Notation NormedModule := NormedModule.type
minus = fun (G : AbelianGroup) (x y : G) => plus x (opp y) : forall G : AbelianGroup, G -> G -> G Argument G is implicit and maximally inserted
ball = fun M : UniformSpace => UniformSpace.ball M (UniformSpace.class M) : forall M : UniformSpace, M -> R -> M -> Prop Argument M is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ R_scope _]
norm = NormedModule.norm K (NormedModuleAux.Pack K V (NormedModule.class K V) V) (NormedModule.class K V) : V -> R
*** [ R : Set ]
NormedModule.Mixin : forall (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModuleAux K) (norm : V -> R) (norm_factor : R), (forall x y : V, norm (plus x y) <= norm x + norm y) -> (forall (l : K) (x : V), norm (scal l x) <= abs l * norm x) -> (forall (x y : V) (eps : R), norm (minus y x) < eps -> ball x eps y) -> (forall (x y : V) (eps : posreal), ball x eps y -> norm (minus y x) < norm_factor * eps) -> (forall x : V, norm x = 0 -> x = zero) -> NormedModule.mixin_of K V
NormedModule.ax3 : forall (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModuleAux K) (m : NormedModule.mixin_of K V) (x y : V) (eps : R), NormedModule.norm K V m (minus y x) < eps -> ball x eps y
Record mixin_of (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModuleAux K) : Type := Mixin { norm : V -> R; norm_factor : R; ax1 : forall x y : V, norm (plus x y) <= norm x + norm y; ax2 : forall (l : K) (x : V), norm (scal l x) <= abs l * norm x; ax3 : forall (x y : V) (eps : R), norm (minus y x) < eps -> ball x eps y; ax4 : forall (x y : V) (eps : posreal), ball x eps y -> norm (minus y x) < norm_factor * eps; ax5 : forall x : V, norm x = 0 -> x = zero } For Mixin: Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope R_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
NormedModule.ax4 : forall (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModuleAux K) (m : NormedModule.mixin_of K V) (x y : V) (eps : posreal), ball x eps y -> NormedModule.norm K V m (minus y x) < NormedModule.norm_factor K V m * eps
UniformSpace.Mixin : forall (M : Type) (ball : M -> R -> M -> Prop), (forall (x : M) (e : posreal), ball x e x) -> (forall (x y : M) (e : R), ball x e y -> ball y e x) -> (forall (x y z : M) (e1 e2 : R), ball x e1 y -> ball y e2 z -> ball x (e1 + e2) z) -> UniformSpace.mixin_of M
locally_not' : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), ~ (forall eps : posreal, ~ (forall y : ?T, ball x eps y -> ~ P y)) -> {d : posreal | forall y : ?T, ball x d y -> ~ P y} where ?T : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K |- UniformSpace]
ball_sym : forall (x y : ?M) (e : R), ball x e y -> ball y e x where ?M : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K |- UniformSpace]
close = fun (M : UniformSpace) (x y : M) => forall eps : posreal, ball x eps y : forall M : UniformSpace, M -> M -> Prop Argument M is implicit and maximally inserted
locally_not : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), ~ (forall eps : posreal, ~ (forall y : ?T, ball x eps y -> ~ P y)) -> locally x (fun y : ?T => ~ P y) where ?T : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K |- UniformSpace]
ball_le : forall (x : ?M) (e1 e2 : R), e1 <= e2 -> forall y : ?M, ball x e1 y -> ball x e2 y where ?M : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K |- UniformSpace]
ball_triangle : forall (x y z : ?M) (e1 e2 : R), ball x e1 y -> ball y e2 z -> ball x (e1 + e2) z where ?M : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K |- UniformSpace]
Record mixin_of (M : Type) : Type := Mixin { ball : M -> R -> M -> Prop; ax1 : forall (x : M) (e : posreal), ball x e x; ax2 : forall (x y : M) (e : R), ball x e y -> ball y e x; ax3 : forall (x y z : M) (e1 e2 : R), ball x e1 y -> ball y e2 z -> ball x (e1 + e2) z } For mixin_of: Argument scope is [type_scope] For Mixin: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
locally = fun (T : UniformSpace) (x : T) (P : T -> Prop) => exists eps : posreal, forall y : T, ball x eps y -> P y : forall T : UniformSpace, T -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope]
abs_minus : forall x y : ?K, abs (minus x y) = abs (minus y x) where ?K : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K |- AbsRing]
norm_triangle : forall x y : V, norm (plus x y) <= norm x + norm y
AbsRing_ball_sym : forall (K : AbsRing) (x y : K) (e : R), AbsRing_ball K x e y -> AbsRing_ball K y e x
ln_increasing : forall x y : R, 0 < x -> x < y -> ln x < ln y
exp_increasing : forall x y : R, x < y -> exp x < exp y
UniformSpace.ax2 : forall (M : Type) (m : UniformSpace.mixin_of M) (x y : M) (e : R), UniformSpace.ball M m x e y -> UniformSpace.ball M m y e x
Rlt_eps2_eps : forall eps : R, eps > 0 -> eps * / 2 < eps
AbsRing_ball_triangle : forall (K : AbsRing) (x y z : K) (e1 e2 : R), AbsRing_ball K x e1 y -> AbsRing_ball K y e2 z -> AbsRing_ball K x (e1 + e2) z
locally_ex_not : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), locally x (fun y : ?T => ~ P y) -> {d : posreal | forall y : ?T, ball x d y -> ~ P y} where ?T : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K |- UniformSpace]
minus_trans : forall r x y : ?G, minus x y = plus (minus x r) (minus r y) where ?G : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K |- AbelianGroup]
UniformSpace.ax3 : forall (M : Type) (m : UniformSpace.mixin_of M) (x y z : M) (e1 e2 : R), UniformSpace.ball M m x e1 y -> UniformSpace.ball M m y e2 z -> UniformSpace.ball M m x (e1 + e2) z
opp_minus : forall x y : ?G, opp (minus x y) = minus y x where ?G : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K |- AbelianGroup]
norm_scal : forall (l : K) (x : V), norm (scal l x) <= abs l * norm x
locally_ex_dec : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), (forall x0 : ?T, P x0 \/ ~ P x0) -> locally x P -> {d : posreal | forall y : ?T, ball x d y -> P y} where ?T : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K |- UniformSpace]
filterlim_locally : forall (f : ?T -> ?U) (y : ?U), filterlim f ?F (locally y) < -> (forall eps : posreal, ?F (fun x : ?T => ball y eps (f x))) where ?T : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K |- Type] ?U : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K |- UniformSpace] ?F : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K |- Filter ?F]
scal_minus_distr_r : forall (x y : ?K) (u : ?V), scal (minus x y) u = minus (scal x u) (scal y u) where ?K : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K |- Ring] ?V : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K |- ModuleSpace ?K]
is_pos_div_2 : forall eps : posreal, 0 < eps / 2

```coq
intros x y eps H.
apply NormedModule.ax3 with (K:=K) (V:=V) (m:=NormedModule.class K V).
auto.
Qed.
```
